Summary Professional offering of total 18 years of work experience out of which more than 15 years of rich experience in IT inclusive of 8+ years in Technical Leadership.  
 
Managing Projects in the capacity of team leader in Waterfall and Scrum/ Agile methodology, gained expertise in managing multiple projects spanned across Development, Implementation, Testing, and Upgrades & Support.

Summary Senior IT leader with 20+ years of expertise in SDLC and building highly successful Enterprise applications from inception to release 
 
Bring in a good balance of Technology and Business acumen. Proven track record in delivery and operations with a strong emphasis on people, processes and technology. Strong emphasis on building trust based relationships, high quality deliverables, driving down costs, delivering beyond business expectations and ensuring the team comes through on its promises. Building, motivating, and driving teams and individuals to achieve company objectives 
 
Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to present complex technical information in a clear and concise manner to a variety of audiences 
 
In summary, an accomplished leader with proven track record for managing entire software development lifecycle, hiring, training, and mentoring resources, responding to demanding customers, and managing multiple projects simultaneously. 
 
Specialties:  
Design, Develop and Deliver enterprise web applications and web portals 
Building and Managing diversified, cross-functional teams 
Managing Teams 
Managing Vendors 
QA and Production Support 
 
Technical Specialities: 
•	Content Management and Globalization Management Systems 
•	CMS and GMS systems architecture 
•	Interwoven Teamsite and complete product suite 
•	SDL World Server 
•	Project Management 
 
Dual Masters and Engineering background 
•	Masters in Project Management - Texas, USA 
•	Masters in Business Administration - California, USA

•	Bachelors in Engineering - Pune, India Experience Senior Manager - Delivery & Support Intel Corporation (Bengaluru, India / Texas, USA / California, USA) - June 2005 onwards December 2010  – Present (4 years 9 months) Bengaluru, India Sr. Manager - Dec 2010 - Present - Lead teams for delivery and support 
Sr. Architect - Feb 2007 - Nov 2010 - Create technical architecture and solutions 
Sr. Team Lead - Jun 2005 - Feb 2005 - Lead development teams and build web solutions 
 
Responsible for Delivery (architecture, development and QA) and Production Support for enterprise web portals and applications 
 
Lead cross functional team of architects, developers, QA and support staff building, delivering and supporting web sites and web applications including www.mcafee.com, Intranet and others 
 
Lead enterprise Sharepoint team for managing the enterprise global Sharepoint implementation. 
 
Lead web production support team for handling 24*7 production support activities for all web applications 
 
Adoption of Agile for faster releases of deliverables. Handle end-to-end delivery of multiple external and internal facing web projects and applications 
 
Architected and Deployed coherence caching solution for better website performance 
 
Built and mentored large global teams across countries to provide round the clock delivery and support as well as lead successful adoption of latest technologies via strong partnerships with key vendors. 
 
Execution against project plans and delivery commitments; Handle Project Management activities for timely release of projects into production. Work with multiple cross functional teams across the world. Status reporting to senior management. Interview and managing resources, mentoring, and maintaining best-of-class global engineering teams  
 
Vendor management activities to define processes and policies for hiring, efficient working of resources, systems, integrations and relationships. Senior Technical Architect Intel Corporation February 2007  –  November 2010  (3 years 10 months) Dallas/Fort Worth Area Technical architect for content management systems, globalization management systems and web architecture. Put together the architecture for corporate website and multiple other customer facing websites and applications including www.mcafee.com 
 
Review business requirements, design and architect systems. Work with on-site and off-shore resources in various areas like development, QA, server operations, production support to architect and develop the best technical design and approach for development and delivery 
 
Technical bridge between development teams and vendors for evaluating tools, choosing right solutions, handling support issues and preparing management report for procurement Technical Lead McAfee Inc (Sunnyvale, California, USA) June 2005  –  February 2007  (1 year 9 months) Served as a team lead for about 8 engineers (onshore and offshore) for timely delivery of mission critical large scale web projects. 
 
Senior/Lead Developer responsible for design and development of the company website using Interwoven product suite 
 
Technical direction for on-shore and off-shore developers. Responsible for the over-all systems development life cycle. Development experience on multiple Platforms 
 
Management and execution against project plans and delivery commitments 
 
Report on status of development to senior management Technical Support Engineer Interwoven, INC (Maryland, USA) October 2002  –  June 2005  (2 years 9 months) Worked with Interwoven clients around the world to address all their technical issues with the entire interwoven product suite.  
 
Very highly rated for customer satisfaction skills and technical expertise. Technologies included Perl/CGI, ASP.Net, Content Management Systems, PL/SQL, Javascript, VB, C++, Unix Engineer - R&D CMC Ltd (Hyderabad, India) May 1995  –  June 1997  (2 years 2 months) Worked with ARTS Group on Indian Railways project.

User Training and Technical Trainings at various locations in the country. Summary My professional experience within the information management industry spans over 25 years in roles as the consultant and client. My current position functions as a Client Adviser to work closely with technology groups, solution engineers, systems integrators and project teams for Virtualization and Cloud Computing. This engineer role is tasked with the design, build, test and consult on Cisco, EMC, Intel, Microsoft, VMware, Citrix and Dell Data Center technologies.  
 
My clearance is ACTIVE for the Department of Defense (DoD). 
 
ITIL V3 Foundation Certified 
 
Specialties: My specialty areas are within the areas of Cloud Computing, Virtualization, Data Center Cost Reduction and Information Assurance including Business Continuity/Disaster Recovery. 
 
These best practices have been applied to vertical markets of Financial Services, Telecommunications, Health Care, High Technology and Government (Civilian and Military). Summary Jayaprakash Radhakrishna has around twenty five plus years of experience in Telecom and Information technology with a focus on Wide Area Networks, System Integration, Consultancy and Business Development. He also has strong exposure to Voice Networks, Wide Area Networks, Radio and Satellite communications and possesses strong design skills gained thru hands on expertise on various technologies and products in the areas of Enterprise voice solutions, Contact Center solutions,Convergence solutions and Unified Communications. He has been trained on most of the well known products from Nortel, Avaya, Cisco, IBM in the above solution space. He has worked on various large overseas projects in the US, Singapore and Africa to name a few.
